peace: Today it's up to you to create the peacefulness you long for.
friend: A friend asks only for your time not your money.
time: A friend asks only for your time not your money.
money: A friend asks only for your time not your money.
best: If you refuse to accept anything but the best, you very often get it.
smile: A smile is your passport into the hearts of others.
healthy: A good way to keep healthy is to eat more Chinese food.
future: Hard work pays off in the future, laziness pays off now.
now: Hard work pays off in the future, laziness pays off now.
change: Change can hurt, but it leads a path to something better.
companion: Enjoy the good luck a companion brings you.
attract: People are naturally attracted to you.
meeting: A chance meeting opens new doors to success and friendship.
mistakes: You learn from your mistakes... You will learn a lot today.
good: If you have something good in your life, don't let it go!
shoes: Your shoes will make you happy today.
life: You cannot love life until you live the life you love.
events: Be on the lookout for coming events; They cast their shadows beforehand.
land: Land is always on the mind of a flying bird.
adversity: Meeting adversity well is the source of your strength.
dream: A dream you have will come true.
deeds: Our deeds determine us, as much as we determine our deeds.
failure: Never give up. You're not a failure if you don't give up.
believe: You will become great if you believe in yourself.
great: You will become great if you believe in yourself.
prosper: There is no greater pleasure than seeing your loved ones prosper.
questions: You already know the answer to the questions lingering inside your head.
world: It is now, and in this world, that we must live.
happiness: You can make your own happiness.
risk: The greatest risk is not taking one.
virtue: Adversity is the parent of virtue.
share: A short stranger will soon enter your life with blessings to share.
try: Now is the time to try something new.
conviction: If you feel you are right, stand firmly by your convictions.
winter: If winter comes, can spring be far behind?
special: Keep your eye out for someone special.
talent: You are very talented in many ways.
stranger: A stranger, is a friend you have not spoken to yet.
voyage: A new voyage will fill your life with untold memories.
trip: A new voyage will fill your life with untold memories.
travel: You will travel to many exotic places in your lifetime.
ability: Your ability for accomplishment will follow with success.
sense: Nothing astonishes men so much as common sense and plain dealing.
credit: Its amazing how much good you can do if you dont care who gets the credit.
goat: if you don't want anyone to get your goat, don't let them know where you have it tied.
confucius: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
go: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
job: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
glory: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
rise: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
fall: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
do: I hear and I forget. I see and I remember. I do and I understand.
goal: When it is obvious that the goals cannot be reached, don't adjust the goals, adjust the action steps.
knowledge: Real knowledge is to know the extent of one's ignorance.
ignorance: Real knowledge is to know the extent of one's ignorance.
silence: Silence is a true friend who never betrays.
success: Success depends upon previous preparation, and without such preparation there is sure to be failure.
flaw: Better a diamond with a flaw than a pebble without.
